title: Comm.'s Dept Intern-Summer 2016: End of May-Sept. - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-14-2015 Brief Job Description: The Communications department offers interns practical experience writing press releases, planning press conferences, producing and editing web videos, executing social-media campaigns...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
